title: Late Person

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Make someone late tonight, causing their action to be processed last. If they died before their action is processed, their action will not be processed.
> Once per game, make someone permanently 12 hours late, changing their night abilities to day abilities, and day abilities into night abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Roleblock/Redirect Immune
> For all intents and purposes, this role was created 23 hours and 59 minutes after the post for the role **Role Challenge** (4100).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who would oppose the Town.

desc:
Post 4104
*"What do you mean I'm late? This is the earliest I've ever been."*
